altername_name: Aoki Ookami to Shiroki Mejika: Genghis Khan
name: The Blue Wolf and The White Stag: Genghis Khan
overview: The game takes the player inside the virtual life of either Genghis Khan or one of his archrivals. The player must arrange marriages, father children, appoint family members to governmental positions, and fight in order to conquer the Old World. Armies must be drafted and soldiers must be trained if the player is to rule the lands from England to Japan.
